EP and Claim Label Adjustment Following Completion of BDD Intake Site Development Action
The intake site must change the diary EP 336 to the proper EP and claim label for the claim type
after
all development actions have been taken.
Claim Type
BDD-EP- Claim Label
original
110 –
BDD-Initial
010 –
BDD-Initial 8+ Issues
new service connection (SC)
increased evaluation
020 –
BDD-Non-Original
If the diary EP 336 has matured to a pending EP (i.e., the suspense date of the day following discharge from active duty has been reached), the pending EP must also be changed to the proper EP and claim label.
Important
:  Supplemental claims from a claimant on active duty that are processed under the BDD program remain contentions under the BDD EP.  Do not establish EP 040 until the claimant is discharged from active duty.
References
:  For more information on
EP use in BDD cases, see
M21-4, Appendix B

M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.A.2.b
EP control of supplemental claim issues processed within BDD, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.A.2.c
, and
claim label use in BDD cases, see
M21-4, Appendix C, 1.b
.
